meanings.definition: The ability to understand and interpret visual information.
meanings.sent1: Her graphicacy helped her analyze the chart quickly.
meanings.sent2: His graphicacy made it easy for him to follow the map.
meanings.sent3: With his impressive graphicacy, he could decipher the diagram in seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her graphicacy was like a superpower when it came to decoding images.
meanings.sent5: The workshop improved their graphicacy through fun activities.

meanings.definition: The skill or competence in creating or designing visual representations.
meanings.sent1: His graphicacy in drawing cartoons was exceptional.
meanings.sent2: She honed her graphicacy by practicing digital art.
meanings.sent3: The graphicacy of the artist brought life to the illustrations.
meanings.sent4: His graphicacy was a paintbrush that turned ideas into images.
meanings.sent5: The course enhanced their graphicacy in graphic design.

meanings.definition: The use of visual aids or graphics to convey information effectively.
meanings.sent1: The presentation's graphicacy made the data clear.
meanings.sent2: Graphicacy in teaching helps students grasp concepts better.
meanings.sent3: The graphicacy of the slides added a touch of creativity to the lecture.
meanings.sent4: The graphicacy of the infographic was a visual feast for the eyes.
meanings.sent5: Improving graphicacy in reports can enhance understanding.
